_[**PFS Note**](PFS.aspx): While the Deathless Acolyte of Urgathoa can be used for the purpose of summoning spells and similar, the rules for Deathless Deity Adjustments may not be used in Organized Play._
Deathless acolytes typically arise when a deity or their herald expends a minor amount of power to return a low-ranking priest. Some priests are powerful enough in life to return, greatly lessened, of their own volition. **[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 18 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13 [Deathless Acolyte of Urgathoa](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1853) **Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 88 **Perception** +9; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12) **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20) **Skills** [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +9, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +8, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +11, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7 **Str** +1 **Dex** +2 **Con** +0 **Int** +1 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +2 **Items** [Scythe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=39), [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of [Urgathoa](/Deities.aspx?ID=19) --- **AC** 17 **Fort** +7 **Ref** +7 **Will** +11 **HP** 36 ([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42)) **Immunities** [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) **Field of Undeath** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) 20 feet. Allies within the aura who have [negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42) gain [fast healing 2](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15). When a creature within the aura would receive [positive](/Traits.aspx?ID=128) [healing](/Traits.aspx?ID=89), it must succeed at a DC 5 flat check or receive no healing from the effect.
**Denounce Heretic** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) **Trigger** A creature within 60 feet who the deathless acolyte can see and who doesn't worship [Urgathoa](/Deities.aspx?ID=19) casts a divine spell; **Effect** The deathless acolyte attempts to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) the triggering spell using their spell attack modifier and a counteract level of 2. If the deathless acolyte fails to counteract the spell, the caster is temporarily immune to further uses of Denounce Heretic for 24 hours. --- **Speed** 25 feet **Melee** scythe +10 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 1d10+4 slashing **Divine Prepared Spells** DC 19, attack +11 - **Cantrips (2nd)** [Chill Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=35), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280) - **1st** [Bane](/Spells.aspx?ID=18), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244) - **2nd** [Animate Dead](/Spells.aspx?ID=666), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (×3) **Cleric Domain Spells** DC 19, 1 Focus Point - **2nd** [Touch of Undeath](/Spells.aspx?ID=461)
name: Deathless Acolyte of Urgathoa
